input.sentences: i went to the city of visit some family .
along the way | i met some family i 'd never seen before .
we stopped by this place on our way to meet each other for food .
we all were happy together eating .
our family has never been more close .
output.sentences: Every year I have to take the new hires under my wing.
I feel like I spend half my day waiting for them to follow me around.
Once we finish up with the building tour we can get out of this rain.
The best part of my job is the expense account, gotta feed the newbies.
Worst part of this job, pretending like I didn't eat out when I meet up with my wife.
